OOC: I am with Zardus on this one. Ever since you have joined Dewboy
there have been at least 15 extra posts a day, that are ooc, that you
could have easily sent privately. I wouldnt have minded if it was just
one or two a day, but you literally don't seem to leave the computer,
and talk about everyithing over the entire RPG. And why are you
complaining Tankor, a lot of them happen to be yours as well. Please cut
it back guys.
